definitions.definition: Fashionable ; popular ; up to date ; current .
examples: I think this band's sound is very now .

definitions.definition: At the time the will is written. Used in order to prevent any inheritance from being transferred to a person of a future marriage. Does not indicate the existence of a previous marriage.

secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Fashionable ; popular ; up to date ; current .

( archaic , law ) At the time the will is written. Used in order to prevent any inheritance from being transferred to a person of a future marriage. Does not indicate the existence of a previous marriage.
